summary: Filter an array based on a logical expression
description: Filters the array elements based on a logical expression so that afterwards an array is returned that only contains the values conforming to the expression.

expression.description: An expression that is evaluated against each value in the array. An array element is dropped if the expression returns `false`.

x.description: A value of any type could be passed.

returns.description: An array filtered by the specified expression. The number of elements are less than or equal compared to the original array.
